summary: The 'Pursuing Equity in Mental Health Act' aims to address mental health disparities for youth, particularly youth of color. It amends existing legislation to prioritize services for racial and ethnic minority groups, mandates research on mental health disparities, enhances health professions training to address these disparities, establishes an outreach and education strategy, and provides additional funding for the National Institutes of Health and the National Institute on Minority Health and Health Disparities to support research and programs related to this issue.
